Welcome!

I am a Ph.D. scholar at NCMRWF, Noida, working in the field of subseasonal variability of the Indian Summer Monsoon. My research focuses on understanding convective processes, MJO/BSISO, CAPE/CIN dynamics, and their role in intraseasonal rainfall predictability.
